d:
Kouhei and Mako are a couple deeply in love, but Kouhei worries about Mako’s reluctance to have sex with him. One day, Mako makes an unexpected proposal…

n: [Manga] [Miike Kei] Soredemo Ashita mo Kareshi ga ii - Chapter 5
